item.title: Trump's Third Act: The Honey Badger
item.description: Can you guess Stephen K. Bannon’s mantra at Breitbart? It’s not, “act like a Republican and lose.” It’s not “pivot,” a word I detest. “Honey badger don’t give a s—” is the Breitbart motto, and “the most dangerous political operative in America” is now running Donald Trump’s campaign. Raise the curtain on act three. https://youtu.be/4r7wHMg5Yjg The entire political world is reeling today with news that Donald Trump has named the incredible Stephen K.
